User:

	- /users/self
	- /users/{user-Id} (only for the id of the owner of the token)
	- /users/media/recent
	- /users/{user-Id}/media/recent (same as id)

Media:

	- /media/{media-Id} (media of the owner of the token)

Comments:

	- /media/{media-Id}/comments (same as media)

Likes:

	- /media/{media-Id}/likes (same)
